thread.title: Papi

author: Papi
title: Papi
text: I contacted Intoxalock first in a list of possible vendors I was going to use. From the beginning of the call Jeff ext 253 was Great! Less than half way through the call I knew I wouldn't be wasting my day away with contacting anyone else. Jeff helped me locate installers that were offering rebates on the install. He answered all of my questions including the ones I had days later and he promptly called me back when I left messages with these questions. Jeff made what is not the most exciting process one has to go through completely pain and worry free. Thanks Intoxalock and Thank You Jeff!
